data.name: 0000 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hahh... "Go get us the key," huh.

data.name: 0001 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The singularities will only grow while we're at it. Who knows when an abnormal space will form?

data.name: 0002 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hence why I wanna keep Haruhi out of that music room if I can.

data.name: 0003 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're looking rather down.

data.name: 0004 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm hard pressed finding anything that'd raise my spirits at a time like this.

data.name: 0005 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm more concerned about how you seem to be enjoying yourself.

data.name: 0006 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: With the situation developing to this point, from here on out, whatever happens, happens.

data.name: 0007 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Consequently, I believe it to be best for my mental health to enjoy what I can.

data.name: 0008 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Whatever happens, happens, huh.

data.name: 0009 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that something like the "classified information" we occasionally hear from Asahina?

data.name: 0011 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what? Umm... That's sort of different…

data.name: 0012 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't worry, Asahina, I'm not asking you to explain it, sorry.

data.name: 0013 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Really...? Phew...

data.name: 0014 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh right, Koizumi.

data.name: 0015 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0016 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we tell Haruhi we weren't able to borrow the key…

data.name: 0017 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She wouldn't give up on it... I guess. Even saying it myself I'm not convinced.

data.name: 0018 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite right. If we said such a thing, it wouldn't surprise me to see Miss Suzumiya...

data.name: 0019 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...barge into the staff room herself to get the key.

data.name: 0020 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I think it's best not to tell ill-conceived lies.

data.name: 0021 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-umm... Then…

data.name: 0022 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it, Asahina?

data.name: 0023 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I was wondering--what if we told Suzumiya that we lost the key...

data.name: 0024 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...on the way back to the music room?

data.name: 0025 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm, I see... Haruhi might give up on it if we tell her that.

data.name: 0026 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …I'm afraid that isn't such a good Idea.

data.name: 0027 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If she can't get in the music room, she'd most likely decide...

data.name: 0028 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...to stand watch from the outside.

data.name: 0029 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're dealing with the sound of a piano, after all. Such can be heard from outside the room.

data.name: 0030 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya even stated she'd open the door by force in such a case...

data.name: 0031 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm not sure how to handle things if they come to that…

data.name: 0032 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn, so that's no good either, huh...

data.name: 0033 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek… Then, what should we do?

data.name: 0034 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So to sum it up--there is no good plan, huh...

data.name: 0035 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …We should go get the key for the time being. We don't need Haruhi barging into the...

data.name: 0036 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...staff room and harming our reputation any more than she already has, after all.

data.name: 0039 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Getting them to lend us the key was easier than I expected.

data.name: 0040 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: The teacher looked at our filled out lending application form and pulled a troubled face...

data.name: 0041 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...and told us not to do anything stupid, but that was it.

data.name: 0042 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Don't do anything stupid," huh.

data.name: 0043 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Certainly an indication that he's starting to get us, but... we probably can't promise that.

data.name: 0045 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're losing rather a lot of time. Shall we hurry back to the meeting point?

data.name: 0048 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The three of us crossed the hallway, heading back to the meeting point.

data.name: 0049 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was a gust of wind in the hallway.

data.name: 0050 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A poster that had fallen in the corner of the hallway was lightly lifted…

data.name: 0051 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kya！？

data.name: 0052 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina stepped on that poster and slipped over magnificently.

data.name: 0053 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Waaaaaah... I-it hurts…

data.name: 0054 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you okay?

data.name: 0055 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: My backside hurts…

data.name: 0056 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina tilted her head as she stood up, teary-eyed…

data.name: 0057 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For some reason, she turned pale.

data.name: 0058 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh... huh? Huh? Huh--?

data.name: 0059 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is something the matter?

data.name: 0060 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no... Oh... Yes... Um…

data.name: 0061 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: The key I was holding is... um... gone…

data.name: 0062 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Key...? You mean... to the music room?

data.name: 0063 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes... I'm sorry…

data.name: 0064 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Did you drop it when you fell or some time earlier?

data.name: 0065 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm not sure... I know I had it when I left the staff room...

data.name: 0066 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, obviously--unless you forgot to take it or something.

data.name: 0067 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suppose we've no option but to search for it.

data.name: 0068 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I suppose. Should we split up and search?

data.name: 0069 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Owwww... I'm so sorry…

data.name: 0070 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's nothing we can do about losing it. As long as we find it quickly it's no problem…

data.name: 0071 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You might've kicked it away as you slipped, so should we...

data.name: 0072 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...check outside the hallway?

data.name: 0073 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay.

data.name: 0074 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then for now I shall look through the hallway up to the staffroom.

data.name: 0075 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, thanks.

data.name: 0076 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi walked off, so the two of Asahina and I started our search from here.

data.name: 0077 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ow... It hurts…

data.name: 0078 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you okay? It sounded like you landed really hard.

data.name: 0079 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes... My backside hurts…

data.name: 0080 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Rubbing her backside with one hand, Asahina truly looked in a lot of pain.

data.name: 0081 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unfortunately there's no way I can rub it for her, right...

data.name: 0082 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Um.

data.name: 0083 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Kyon?

data.name: 0084 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? Oh, it's nothing. Right, let's get searching then.

data.name: 0085 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, let's. Though, it really does hurt... Oww...

data.name: 0086 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Huh?

data.name: 0087 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did you hear a key just now?

data.name: 0088 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh...?

data.name: 0089 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I can definitely hear it.

data.name: 0090 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When Asahina touches her skirt, I can definitely hear it coming from somewhere.

data.name: 0091 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: H-huh...?

data.name: 0092 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina kept shaking her skirt and feeling around her backside...

data.name: 0093 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At last, she put her hand in her skirt pocket and timidly pulled out the object...

data.name: 0094 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...within.

data.name: 0095 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh... The key. I-I had it all along…

data.name: 0096 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …What on earth?

data.name: 0097 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe we were jumping ahead of ourselves when we said she lost it?

data.name: 0098 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The blue bird of happiness was right with us all along, huh. I sighed at such a development.

data.name: 0099 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I-I'm sorry…

data.name: 0100 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not at all... You found it, which is all that matters... Honestly.

data.name: 0101 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuuuuhh…

data.name: 0102 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina seemed incredibly embarrassed by it all.

data.name: 0103 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina, please don't feel bad about it.

data.name: 0104 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's just tell Koizumi that we found it dropped over here when he gets back.

data.name: 0105 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's hurry back to the meeting point.

data.name: 0106 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay…

data.name: 0107 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina really seems overly ashamed about all this. I feel like it's only making me...

data.name: 0108 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...feel worse about it myself. I hope she cheers up soon.

data.name: 0109 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was still rubbing her backside in pain as I thought about that.

data.name: 0110 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll retrace our steps back to the staff room to see if we dropped the key on the way.

data.name: 0111 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think it'd be easy to miss it on your own, so I'll join you.

data.name: 0112 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is quite reassuring. Thank you very much.

data.name: 0113 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-then I'll search around here.

data.name: 0114 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Since I might've dropped it as I fell…

data.name: 0115 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good luck, Mikuru. Let's go, Koizumi.

data.name: 0118 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I headed back to the staff room with Koizumi to see if the key wasn't dropped in the...

data.name: 0119 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...corner of the hallway or something, but... it wasn't.

data.name: 0120 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suppose we can't find it…

data.name: 0121 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, if we tell Haruhi honestly that we lost the key and we're going to look for it...

data.name: 0122 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...won't that buy us some time?

data.name: 0123 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It certainly doesn't seem like a bad idea, but…

data.name: 0124 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In the end, it's best we give up on the idea.

data.name: 0125 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why though?

data.name: 0126 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Suzumiya thinks deeply about trying to find the key, we won't have saved time at all.

data.name: 0127 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't you think so?

data.name: 0128 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Your people's theory again, huh.

data.name: 0129 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That Haruhi can change the world to her convenience or whatever, right?

data.name: 0130 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You yourself have been beholden to the influence of Miss Suzumiya's power.

data.name: 0131 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...So your point is?

data.name: 0132 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, well you're not wrong, but…

data.name: 0133 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: As much as that may be the case, this is something so insignificant.

data.name: 0134 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is exactly because it is insignificant that I believe it to be feasible.

data.name: 0135 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A large miracle would appear unnatural, whereas a small miracle can be overlooked.

data.name: 0136 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Is that how it is...

data.name: 0137 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is indeed how it is.

data.name: 0138 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But even so, it's true that we've come all the way to the staff room and not found the key.

data.name: 0139 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If no matter what we do, we can't find it, we can tell Haruhi and have her search for us.

data.name: 0140 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Asahina may have found it herself, so let's head back for now.

data.name: 0141 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, that's a fair point.

data.name: 0143 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, we didn't find it where we looked--what about you?

data.name: 0144 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um…

data.name: 0145 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Um?

data.name: 0146 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I... I'm sorry--!

data.name: 0147 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina all of a sudden bowed her head deeply.

data.name: 0148 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what's this all of a sudden? Look, there's no need to lower your head.

data.name: 0150 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is something the matter?

data.name: 0151 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuuuhh... I found... the key…

data.name: 0152 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ohh, that's--

data.name: 0153 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no... U-um, I just made a mistake... I actually...

data.name: 0154 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I actually never lost the key in the first place... Uuuuhh...

data.name: 0155 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't really get it, but all that matters is that you found it, right?

data.name: 0156 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It may have held us up a little, but if you found the key, we should head back to the...

data.name: 0157 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...meeting point. I'm not interested in provoking the fury of our brigade chief.

data.name: 0158 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're not wrong. Let's go, Asahina.

data.name: 0159 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay…

data.name: 0160 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Must've been quite a shock to her.

data.name: 0161 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She plodded along dispiritedly.

data.name: 0162 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As for me--I thought once more about what Koizumi just said.

data.name: 0163 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we really didn't find the key, might we have actually found it in no time, thanks to...

data.name: 0164 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...coincidence and opportunism?

data.name: 0165 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I honestly couldn't say for sure without seeing for myself.

data.name: 0166 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll search around here.

data.name: 0167 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, how about you two retrace our steps back to the staff room looking for it?

data.name: 0168 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Very well, understood. Let us head off at once.

data.name: 0169 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, okay--

data.name: 0170 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The two of them painted the halls with their eyes, heading back to the staff room.

data.name: 0171 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then... If it's fallen around here this'll be incredible easy…

data.name: 0172 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I should've known there's no way it'd be that easy.

data.name: 0173 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The only thing I can find that dropped in this hallway...

data.name: 0174 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...is that poster Asahina slipped on.

data.name: 0175 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Looks like it's been marked with her footprint. ...Hm?

data.name: 0176 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It wasn't Asahina's footprint that caught my attention...

data.name: 0177 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, it was the poster itself that was bothering me.

data.name: 0178 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A national high school music composition contest... huh.

data.name: 0179 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems to be a contest for high schoolers for writing original music.

data.name: 0180 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Maybe I can use this for something?

data.name: 0181 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Here's my story.

data.name: 0182 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's a student working hard writing a piece for this contest.

data.name: 0183 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That Computer Society club member heard their piano playing by chance.

data.name: 0184 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems quite credible with this poster to back me up.

data.name: 0185 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Alright then, I'll suggest it to the other two when they get back.

data.name: 0186 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're back, and we found the key.

data.name: 0187 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ohh, that's great. So it had fallen somewhere?

data.name: 0188 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that's... Eeek…

data.name: 0189 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For some reason, Asahina showed me the key with a troubled look.

data.name: 0190 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In reality, the key was still in Asahina's pocked.

data.name: 0191 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems she didn't realize after the fall disturbed it.

data.name: 0192 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What? ...So basically, it was never dropped in the first place?

data.name: 0193 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeek... I'm so sorry...

data.name: 0194 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: N-no, I'm not saying you did anything wrong…

data.name: 0195 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's all my fault…

data.name: 0196 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina seemed to be looking glum about making us search in vain.

data.name: 0197 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I should just change the topic and try to cheer her up.

data.name: 0198 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You two--take a look at this poster.

data.name: 0199 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Huh?

data.name: 0200 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A music composition contest? I believe I saw a poster like this outside the staff room as well.

data.name: 0201 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What of it?

data.name: 0202 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I unveiled the idea I just came up with to the two of them.

data.name: 0203 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hmm, I see. It all seems to add up quite neatly indeed.

data.name: 0204 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um... Kyon?

data.name: 0205 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yes, what's the matter?

data.name: 0206 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It says the application deadline for this contest was at the end of last month...

data.name: 0207 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm, I guess that's inconsistent with the piano sound heard in the last few days...

data.name: 0208 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...so it doesn't really work as an explanation…

data.name: 0209 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It may be usable as long as Miss Suzumiya pays no notice to the deadline.

data.name: 0210 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It rather benefits us to have a selection of options. We should aim to be prepared.

data.name: 0211 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I can't deny that.

data.name: 0212 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I put away the poster.

data.name: 0213 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then, let's head back to the meeting point.

data.name: 0214 (412.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There're no two ways about it--we've wasted so much time that Haruhi will definitely be mad.

data.name: 0215 (412.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek…

data.name: 0216 (412.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's no way of knowing what awaits us if we upset her too much, so we'd best hurry.

data.name: 0217 (412.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that in mind and music room key in hand, we headed back to the meeting point.

data.name: 0218 (412.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search with Asahina

data.name: 0219 (412.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search with Koizumi

data.name: 0220 (412.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search alone
